description: Collecting things can be an enjoyable hobby. I Collect That! is an entertaining book that introduces students to the concept of a collection and provides many examples of people's interesting and sometimes odd arrays of objects. The book can also be used to teach students how to determine an author's purpose for writing and the proper use of periods. The book and lesson are also available for levels H and K.
